testcase.name: @BeforeClass setUpClass

failure.message:
Couldn't create parent directories of 'C:\Users\Pooja Kirubanandan\eclipse-workspace\CapstoneProject\target\cucumber-reports\registerandlogin.html'. Make sure the the parent directory 'C:\Users\Pooja Kirubanandan\eclipse-workspace\CapstoneProject\target\cucumber-reports' isn't a file.
Note: This usually happens when plugins write to colliding paths. For example: 'html:target/cucumber, json:target/cucumber/report.json' You can fix this by making the paths do no collide. For example: 'html:target/cucumber/report.html, json:target/cucumber/report.json' The details are in the stack trace below:
